name: reg_f3d
author: NiftyReg Developers
description: Fast Free-Form Deformation algorithm for non-rigid registration based on Rueckert's 99 TMI work.

inputs.name: Reference Image
inputs.description: Filename of the reference image

inputs.name: Floating Image
inputs.description: Filename of the floating image

inputs.name: Affine Transformation
inputs.description: Filename which contains an affine transformation

inputs.name: Flirt Affine Transformation
inputs.description: Filename which contains a flirt affine transformation

inputs.name: Control Point Grid Input
inputs.description: Filename of control point grid input

inputs.name: Output Control Point Grid
inputs.description: Filename of control point grid

inputs.name: Output Resampled Image
inputs.description: Filename of the resampled image

inputs.name: Reference Mask Image
inputs.description: Filename of a mask image in the reference space

inputs.name: Smooth Reference Image
inputs.description: Smooth the reference image using the specified sigma (mm)

inputs.name: Smooth Floating Image
inputs.description: Smooth the floating image using the specified sigma (mm)

inputs.name: Number of Bins for Joint Histogram
inputs.description: Number of bins to use for the joint histogram (reference)

inputs.name: Number of Bins for Floating Joint Histogram
inputs.description: Number of bins to use for the joint histogram (floating)

inputs.name: Lower Threshold for Reference Image
inputs.description: Lower threshold to apply to the reference image intensities

inputs.name: Upper Threshold for Reference Image
inputs.description: Upper threshold to apply to the reference image intensities

inputs.name: Lower Threshold for Floating Image
inputs.description: Lower threshold to apply to the floating image intensities

inputs.name: Upper Threshold for Floating Image
inputs.description: Upper threshold to apply to the floating image intensities

inputs.name: Grid Spacing X
inputs.description: Final grid spacing along the x axis in mm (or in voxel if negative value)

inputs.name: Grid Spacing Y
inputs.description: Final grid spacing along the y axis in mm (or in voxel if negative value)

inputs.name: Grid Spacing Z
inputs.description: Final grid spacing along the z axis in mm (or in voxel if negative value)

inputs.name: Bending Energy Penalty Term Weight
inputs.description: Weight of the bending energy penalty term

inputs.name: Linear Elasticity Penalty Term Weights
inputs.description: Weights of linear elasticity penalty term

inputs.name: L2 Norm Displacement Penalty Term Weight
inputs.description: Weight of L2 norm displacement penalty term

inputs.name: Log of the Jacobian Determinant Penalty Term Weight
inputs.description: Weight of log of the Jacobian determinant penalty term

inputs.name: No Approximate JL
inputs.description: Do not approximate the JL value only at the control point position

inputs.name: No Conjugate Gradient
inputs.description: Do not use the conjugate gradient optimization but a simple gradient ascent

inputs.name: Use SSD Similarity Measure
inputs.description: Use the SSD as the similarity measure instead of NMI

inputs.name: Use KL Divergence
inputs.description: Use the KL divergence as the similarity measure instead of NMI

inputs.name: Use Additive NMI for Multichannel Data
inputs.description: Use the additive NMI for multichannel data

inputs.name: Maximal Number of Iterations Per Level
inputs.description: Maximal number of iterations per level

inputs.name: Number of Levels
inputs.description: Number of levels to perform

inputs.name: First Levels
inputs.description: Only perform the first levels

inputs.name: No Pyramidal Approach
inputs.description: Do not use a pyramidal approach

inputs.name: Symmetric Approach
inputs.description: Use symmetric approach

inputs.name: Floating Mask Image
inputs.description: Filename of a mask image in the floating space

inputs.name: Inverse Consistency Penalty Term Weight
inputs.description: Weight of the inverse consistency penalty term

inputs.name: Use Velocity Field Integration
inputs.description: Use velocity field integration to generate the deformation

inputs.name: Number of Composition Steps
inputs.description: Number of composition steps

inputs.name: Smooth Metric Derivative
inputs.description: Smooth the metric derivative (in mm)

inputs.name: Padding Value
inputs.description: Padding value

inputs.name: Verbose Off
inputs.description: Turn verbose off

output-files.name: Output Control Point Grid
output-files.description: File containing the output control point grid
